job_description:
AI/ML Engineer

About Techversant:

Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company with over 16 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions and services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans numerous technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, iOS, Android, Flutter, ReactNative, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, and Business Intelligence.

What’s important to us:

We are looking for experienced AI/ML Engineers to drive new international business opportunities. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Job Description:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for various use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage scalable, observable, and cost-efficient machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure).
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Manage the entire model lifecycle, from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work closely with product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop and demonstrate proofs of concept for AI/ML-based solutions and services to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns suitable for native and hybrid cloud environments.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in scalable, web-ready services and pipelines.
  • Design, develop, and implement state-of-the-art Generative AI models.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience building at least one production-grade Deep Learning or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming, including:
    • Code optimization and profiling
    • Multi-threading and multiprocessing
    • Object-oriented programming and design principles
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Proficient in Python with a strong grasp of object-oriented concepts.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are mandatory.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models (text, vision, audio).
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Contributions to open-source AI/ML or GenAI projects.
  • Cloud-based machine learning platform certifications (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique performance-based leave benefits and encashment options.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • A collaborative and fun family environment with experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for bonus programs (training, certifications, innovation).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company-sponsored international tours.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, please share your updated resume with us at careers@techversantinfotech.com.

job_description:

Job Summary:

Hotpack is seeking a talented and innovative Web Developer to join our dynamic IT department. The ideal candidate will be a versatile professional with a strong background in both front-end and back-end development, coupled with a keen eye for UI/UX design. You will be responsible for developing, managing, and enhancing our diverse digital ecosystem, including our multiple Shopify e-commerce stores, corporate websites, and critical internal platforms like our company-wide intranet. This role is perfect for a proactive problem-solver who is passionate about leveraging technology to drive business growth, improve efficiency, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

Key Responsibilities

  1. E-commerce & Web Development:
    • Develop, maintain, and customize multiple Shopify-based e-commerce stores for the GCC region, creating custom themes, sections, and pages using Liquid, HTML, CSS, and modern JavaScript.
    • Design and implement reusable, scalable, and high-performance web components to ensure consistency and streamline future development.
    • Manage end-to-end web development projects, from conception and design to deployment and ongoing maintenance.
  2. Backend & Systems Automation:
    • Enhance backend functionalities and integrate automation tools to improve the scalability, performance, and operational efficiency of our web platforms.
  3. UI/UX & Design Leadership:
    • Lead UI/UX design initiatives for all corporate and e-commerce websites, ensuring a seamless, engaging, and user-centric experience.
    • Create fully responsive and accessible web layouts that provide an optimal viewing experience across all devices (desktop, tablet, mobile), adhering to modern web standards.
  4. Strategic & Internal Development:
    • Collaborate closely with management, marketing, and other departments to align web and design strategies with overarching business objectives.
    • Continuously research and introduce new technologies, frameworks, and digital process improvements to strengthen Hotpack' online presence and internal efficiency.
    • Provide high-level technical and digital support to various departments, acting as a key resource for innovation and problem-solving.

Required Skills and Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Web Development, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
  • Proven 3 - 4 years of experience as a Web Developer or similar role, with a strong portfolio of web projects.
  • Expert proficiency in front-end technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Liquid.
  • Extensive, hands-on experience with the Shopify platform, including theme customization, app integration, and API usage.
  • Strong understanding of UI/UX principles, responsive design, and web accessibility standards (WCAG).
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently on complex projects.

  • Experience with backend development concepts and integrating with APIs.

  • Manage Red Teaming, Vulnerability Assessment (VA), Penetration Testing (PT), and other risk assessments as per business needs.

KEY SKILLS & BEHAVIOURAL ATTRIBUTES

  • Expertise in information/Cyber security standards, frameworks, and best practices (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST).

Techversant is seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers to develop and drive new business opportunities internationally. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for various use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.

  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Manage the entire model lifecycle, from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.

  • Technical Specifications: Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Scalable ML Implementation: Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines for web-scale applications.
  • Generative AI Model Development: Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Technical Understanding: Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on Experience: Proven experience in building at least one production-grade Deep Learning or Generative AI solution.
  • Python Expertise: Proficiency in Python programming, including code optimization, profiling, multi-threading, multiprocessing, object-oriented programming, and design principles.
  • Cloud Deployment & MLOps: Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Model Evaluation: Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Problem-Solving: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Communication: Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are mandatory.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models (text, vision, audio).
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

About Techversant:

Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company with over 16 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans multiple technology domains, including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, IOS, Android, Flutter, ReactNative, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, and Business Intelligence.

What’s Important to Us:

We are looking for a Lead Full Stack Developer who can balance innovation with practical solutions for our clients. The ideal candidate is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and committed to delivering exceptional results.

Job Description:

  • Full-Stack Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of front-end and back-end web applications using React and Node.js.
  • Architect Solutions: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and secure application architectures aligned with best practices and industry standards.
  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, etc., for scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance and leadership to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and meet project deadlines.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance, both client-side and server-side, for a seamless user experience.
  • Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the evolution of development processes, methodologies, and tooling, driving the adoption of new technologies and practices.
  • Code Reviews & Best Practices: Lead code reviews, enforce coding standards, and maintain high test coverage (unit, integration, E2E).

Required Skills & Experience:

  • 8+ years of experience in full-stack development with strong proficiency in React, Node.js, and JavaScript/TypeScript.
  • In-depth experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure, including services like EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS.
  • Strong experience in backend development with Node.js, including building and integrating REST APIs, middleware, and microservices.
  • Extensive experience with front-end frameworks like Angular or React, including component-driven architecture, state management (e.g., NgRx, Redux), and UI performance optimization.
  • Experience with databases, both SQL (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB), including database design, query optimization, and migrations.
  • Expertise in version control systems, particularly Git, with an understanding of Git workflows and branching strategies.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform for containerization and infrastructure management.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques, including bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, and caching.

Preferred Skills:

  • TypeScript experience and fluency.
  • Familiarity with serverless architectures (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
  • Familiarity with GraphQL and building modern, flexible APIs.
  • Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) for event-driven architectures.
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies and leading cross-functional teams.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs (training hours, certifications, ideas, innovation).
  • Work-life balance: flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Marketing Coordinator to support global marketing and lead-generation activities. This role is responsible for managing day-to-day marketing operations, coordinating content and campaigns, using automation to increase efficiency, and tracking performance through CRM and analytics tools.

1. Marketing Coordination

  • Support the execution of marketing plans and campaigns in collaboration with the global marketing team.
  • Manage and update marketing collaterals (case studies, one-pagers, capability decks, product sheets).
  • Coordinate social media posts, email campaigns, and digital content with internal teams.
  • Maintain and update marketing data, lead sources, and reports in HubSpot CRM.
  • Liaise with content writers, designers, and video creators to meet campaign deadlines.

  • Maintain and coordinate the marketing activity plan (daily, weekly, and monthly tasks).

  • Conduct light market research to identify trends, audience shifts, and competitor positioning.
  • Support benchmarking activities to improve messaging, branding, or campaign direction.
  • Feed insights into campaign strategy, product positioning, and content relevance.
  • Track changes in digital engagement, industry events, or sector-specific opportunities.

4. Performance Tracking & CRM Reporting

  • Measure and report marketing KPIs such as:
  • Lead generation (Marketing Leads vs Sales Qualified Leads)
  • Campaign engagement (clicks, impressions, downloads, form fills)

5. AI & Automation

  • Use HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks.

  • Improve efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates.
  • Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Preferred Skills:

Required:

  • Proficiency with HubSpot CRM (marketing tools, automation, workflows).
  • Experience with digital content coordination and campaign execution.
  • Strong organizational and communication skills.
  • Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and deliverables.
  • Canva, Google Workspace, MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Docs).
  • Good Command in English (both verbal and written).

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS) Location: Basement Floor, Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum , 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com

About Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS): Founded over a decade ago with headquarters in the United Kingdom, Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 software solutions and Leadership 4.0 solutions for world-class organizations globally, including Fortune 500 companies. With global locations in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico, LTS is dedicated to meeting client requirements with bespoke software solutions that address industrial and manufacturing challenges. Our culture nurtures core values: Respect for All, Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, Inclusiveness, and Empathy.

About the Role: LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) to join our growing team in Trivandrum. This role is ideal for individuals passionate about analyzing business processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering technology-driven solutions. The successful candidate will assist in requirement gathering, documentation, and stakeholder communication, alongside supporting customer success activities. This position offers hands-on exposure to real-world projects, fostering a strong foundation in business analysis and enterprise software implementation.

Department: Product / Projects Employment Type: Full-time

Key Learning Opportunities: - Exposure to real-world business analysis in enterprise SaaS projects. - Hands-on experience with requirement management and testing processes. - Practical understanding of Agile methodologies and client communication. - Opportunity to grow into Senior Business Analyst, Product Owner, or Project Manager roles.

Key Responsibilities: 1. Business Requirement Analysis - Gather, analyze, and document business requirements with Project Managers and clients. - Prepare Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Specification Documents (FSD), and User Stories. - Translate business needs into clear, actionable requirements for technical teams. - Participate in requirement workshops, sprint planning, and review meetings. - Support gap analysis between business processes and system capabilities. - Assist in identifying, analyzing, and documenting change requests and their impacts.

2. Process Modelling & Documentation - Map and document as-is and to-be processes using flowcharts, workflow diagrams, or tools like Visio, Lucidchart, or Draw.io. - Support process improvement initiatives and identify optimization opportunities. - Maintain traceability matrices for requirement coverage through design and testing.

3. Project Coordination & Testing - Collaborate with cross-functional teams (developers, QA testers, business stakeholders). - Assist in preparing User Acceptance Testing (UAT) scenarios, test cases, and documentation. - Coordinate UAT sessions, gather feedback, and document results. - Ensure project deliverables meet business expectations and quality standards.

4. Customer & Stakeholder Communication - Act as a bridge between customers and internal teams, ensuring smooth communication. - Respond to client queries and support issues via email, chat, or support systems. - Maintain and update customer documentation, FAQs, and training materials. - Track, escalate, and follow up on customer requests until resolution. - Assist in creating training documents and user manuals for end-users.

5. Research & Continuous Improvement - Conduct market research and competitor analysis for industry trends and product enhancement opportunities. - Stay updated on business analysis methodologies, tools, and frameworks (Agile, Scrum, Lean, etc.). - Contribute to the continuous improvement of internal processes and templates.

Preferred Skills: - Degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Recently Graduated). - Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. - Good command of English (verbal and written); clear and concise documentation ability. - Basic understanding of business processes, SDLC, and Agile methodologies. - Proficiency in MS Office tools (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and familiarity with Jira, Confluence, or similar tools. - Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment. - Proactive attitude with a strong willingness to learn and adapt. - Strong passion and interest in the field.

Application Process: Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line "Junior Business Analyst".

job_description:
No SQL Specialist

Company: Gruppozenit India (P) Ltd Location: Ground Floor, Periyar Building, Technopark, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.gruppozenit.com Contact Email: careers@gruppozenit.com

Closing Date: 05, Nov 2025 Job Published: 22, Oct 2025

Job Description:

The candidate is required to have the following skills:

  • Installation and Configuration: Installing MongoDB on servers and configuring the database to ensure optimal performance. This involves setting up replication, sharding, and security parameters.
  • Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Monitoring the health and performance of MongoDB clusters, identifying bottlenecks, and optimizing the database for efficient operation. This includes analyzing query performance, indexing strategies, and resource utilization.
  • Backup and Recovery: Implementing backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and availability. This involves creating regular backups, implementing replication for fault tolerance, and performing data restores when necessary.
  • Security Management: Configuring access controls, authentication mechanisms, and encryption to secure the MongoDB environment. This includes managing user accounts, roles, and permissions to ensure proper data protection.
  • Capacity Planning: Assessing the resource requirements of MongoDB deployments and planning for future growth. This includes capacity planning, scaling the database horizontally through sharding, and vertical scaling by upgrading hardware resources.
  • Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: Identifying and resolving database-related issues, such as performance degradation, connectivity problems, or data inconsistencies. This involves diagnosing problems, analysing logs, and applying appropriate solutions.
  • Maintain database documentation and provide technical guidance to team members: The candidate will be responsible for maintaining comprehensive database documentation, ensuring that all configurations, procedures, and best practices are well-documented and easily accessible. This includes keeping records of database structures, indexing strategies, backup and recovery processes, and security policies. Additionally, the candidate will provide technical guidance to team members by sharing best practices, assisting with troubleshooting, and helping developers optimize database interactions to improve overall system performance and reliability.

Requirements:

  • 3-5 years of experience as a Database Administrator, with a strong focus on MongoDB.
  • Knowledge of MongoDB 4.2 and higher versions.
  • Hands-on experience with MongoDB replication, sharding, and performance tuning.
  • Proficiency in database monitoring tools and troubleshooting techniques.
  • Experience in scripting and automation (e.g., Python, Bash, or PowerShell).
  • Familiarity with cloud-based database solutions (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is a plus.
  • Understanding of database security, access control, and data integrity principles.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Good communication skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.

Preferred Skills:

  • MongoDB certification (MongoDB Certified DBA or equivalent) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of SQL and experience with other NoSQL databases.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps methodologies.

Application Instructions: On subject Line "Please mention the Post you are applying with Experience / Current Location Preferred Skills"
summary: Seeking a No SQL Specialist with 3-5 years of MongoDB experience for installation, configuration, and performance tuning. Responsibilities include backup, recovery, security, and troubleshooting.

Brief Description

FAYA INNOVATIONS is seeking an Angular Developer to be responsible for the client-side of their service. The primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface for mobile and desktop web applications, emphasizing performance. Key responsibilities include creating modules and components, coupling them into a functional app, and collaborating on animations, CSS, and final HTML output based on provided designs and templates.

The developer will work within a team, communicating with the back-end developer and external APIs. A comprehensive understanding of the platform and infrastructure is essential.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Delivering a complete front-end application.
  • Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop.
  • Writing tested, idiomatic, and documented JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Coordinating the workflow between graphic designers, HTML coders, and the Angular Developer.
  • Cooperating with the back-end developer in building the RESTful API.
  • Communicating with external web services.

Qualifications and Requirements:

  • Proficiency with JavaScript, Typescript, and HTML5.
  • Professional, precise communication skills.
  • Deep knowledge of Angular practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience.
  • Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components.
  • Ensuring a clear dependency chain for app logic and file system.
  • Ability to provide SEO solutions for single-page applications.
  • Validating user actions on the client-side and providing responsive feedback.
  • Writing non-blocking code, utilizing advanced techniques like multi-threading when necessary.
  • Creating custom, general-use modules and components that extend core Angular app elements.
  • Experience building infrastructure for serving the front-end app and assets.
  • Architecting and automating the build process for production using task runners or scripts.
  • Creating end-to-end test suites for all components and running them with Protractor (or a similar tool).
  • Minimum 1-4 Years of experience in Angular is mandatory.

Additional Information:

  • Autonomy & Impact: Own your work, drive innovation, and see your solutions in action.
  • Growth & Mentorship: Be part of an elite team that values continuous learning.
  • Stability & Culture: A performance-driven, transparent, and innovation-friendly environment.
  • Health Benefits: Family medical insurance with up to ₹2L coverage.
  • Compensation: "Brilliance deserves to be well compensated."
  • Location: Technopark phase I, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695581
  • Working Hours: 5 days a week.
summary: Seeking an Angular Developer to build high-performance client-side applications. Responsibilities include implementing UI, creating components, and collaborating with backend developers. Must have 1-4 years of Angular experience.

job_description:
Software Test Engineer (Immediate Joining)

Company: Kvaliteta Systems and Solutions (P) Ltd Location: SBC 2207, 2nd Floor, Yamuna Tower, Technopark Phase 3 Campus, Trivandrum-695583 Website: http://www.kvaliteta.in Contact Email: hr@kvaliteta.in Job Published: 21, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 31, Oct 2025

About Us

Kvaliteta Systems and Solutions, based in Technopark, Trivandrum, is a global IT solutions provider offering a wide range of services, including Digital Transformation, Private Cloud, Infrastructure, Security, and Software Development as a Service. We enable businesses to thrive in the digital era by providing cutting-edge technology solutions.

We are seeking an experienced Software Test Engineer who can assist and empower their development team to deliver with your expertise in creating comprehensive test cases and ensuring the functionality, performance, and security of our platform. The role will focus on testing for different user personas, Java/j2EE, React and Node.js applications, API access, and system integrations.

Experience

3+ Years

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, maintain and execute manual and automated test cases.
  • Test Case Development: Create detailed unit tests and other test cases tailored to different user personas who log into the platform, ensuring that each role and group functions as expected, ensuring front-end and back-end components operate correctly and cohesively.
  • API Access Testing: Test API access and interactions based on permissions and roles, ensuring that security and data access control are properly enforced across different user profiles.
  • Performance Testing: Conduct performance testing, focusing on page load times and overall platform responsiveness, identifying areas where optimization is required.
  • Integration Testing: Test the integration of external systems such as API servers, and SSO (Single Sign-On) integrations, ensuring data flows smoothly between systems and functions as expected.
  • Permissions and Role-Based Testing: Validate role-based access and permissions for various user personas, ensuring that different user roles have the appropriate level of access to features and data.
  • Regression Testing: Perform regular regression testing to ensure that new features or bug fixes do not negatively affect the existing functionality of the platform.
  • Security Testing: Ensure that security protocols, including authentication and authorization mechanisms, work properly and safeguard the system from vulnerabilities.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders to understand requirements and provide detailed feedback on potential issues by Identifying and documenting the defects, track issues, and collaborate with the development team for resolution.
  • Design and implement automated tests for web and mobile applications and maintaining automated testing frameworks to streamline the testing process, especially for repetitive and critical functionality.
  • Work with the development team to enhance automation and manual testing processes.
  • Ensure high-quality standards through best testing practices.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 3+ years of experience in both manual and automation testing.
  • Strong expertise in Selenium, Java, and RESTful API testing.
  • Proficiency in manual testing methodologies and test case design.
  • Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins or GitLab.
  • Experience with performance testing tools and Techniques.
  • Experience with bug tracking and test management tools.
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to send their resumes to hr@kvaliteta.in with the job title as the subject. Please include your current CTC, relevant experience, and notice period in the email.
summary: Seeking an experienced Software Test Engineer with 3+ years in manual and automation testing. Responsibilities include test case design, API, performance, integration, and security testing.

Our solutions help businesses accelerate growth and build secure, scalable environments in a digital-first world.

We are seeking an experienced Network & Security Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in enterprise networking, security, and pre-sales collaboration.

Experience:

5 + Years

Job Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, and manage SME and enterprise-level network and security solutions to ensure availability, scalability, and performance.
  • Configure and administer Palo Alto Networks Next-Generation Firewalls, including security policies, traffic filtering, and threat prevention.
  • Deploy and support Cisco routing, switching, SD-WAN, data center, wireless, and Cisco DNAC solutions.
  • Implement and manage Cisco security platforms including Firepower, ASA, ISE, Umbrella, and DUO.
  • Maintain comprehensive documentation: HLD/LLD, network diagrams, WBS, UAT reports, and handover documentation.
  • Provide post-implementation support, including advanced troubleshooting and performance optimization.
  • Conduct Proof of Concepts (POCs) and technical demos for pre-sales and client onboarding.
  • Collaborate with sales and bid teams to contribute to RFP/RFI responses, solution architecture, BoMs, and technical proposals.
  • Identify and resolve network performance bottlenecks and security issues using industry best practices.
  • Stay updated on networking and security trends, emerging technologies, and pursue ongoing certifications.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure successful design-to-deployment transitions.
  • Deliver technical leadership, mentorship, and participate in knowledge sharing across teams.

Required Skills & Certifications:

  • Minimum 5 years of hands-on experience in enterprise network implementation and support.
  • Strong knowledge of Cisco routing/switching (ISR/ASR, Catalyst, Nexus).
  • Experience with Cisco SD-WAN, DNAC, and Unified Communications.
  • Proficiency with VPNs, IDS/IPS, virtualization, and network function virtualization (NFV).
  • Strong exposure to Palo Alto NGFWs and security architecture.
  • Excellent skills in technical documentation and project handover.
  • Solid understanding of DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and automation is a plus.

Certifications:

  • Cisco CCNP (required)
  • Cisco CCIE (preferred)
  • PCNSE (Palo Alto Certified Network Security Engineer) or equivalent recognized security certifications (preferred)
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline.

How to Apply:

Send your resume to hr@kvaliteta.in with “Network & Security Engineer” in the subject line. Please mention: Your Current CTC, Total Relevant Experience, Notice Period.
summary: Seeking a Network & Security Engineer with 5+ years of experience in enterprise networking and security solutions. Responsibilities include design, implementation, and support of Cisco and Palo Alto technologies.

job_description:
Senior QA Lead

Company: Spericorn Technology (P) Ltd Location: Amstor Building, Technopark Phase I, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.spericorn.com Closing Date: 31 October 2025 Job Published: 21 October 2025 Contact Email: careers@spericorn.com

Brief Description

We are looking for a highly experienced and detail-oriented Senior QA Lead to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading QA initiatives, ensuring the highest level of product quality, and driving continuous improvement in testing practices. This role demands excellent communication, leadership, and client management skills.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead and manage the QA team to deliver high-quality releases within timelines.
  • Define, implement, and maintain QA processes, methodologies, and best practices.
  • Develop and execute comprehensive manual and automation test strategies.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams (development, product management, DevOps) to ensure quality throughout the SDLC.
  • Manage client interactions, understand requirements, and provide quality insights proactively.
  • Conduct and oversee testing in multiple areas including Functional and Regression Testing, Performance and Load Testing, security auditing etc.
  • Identify QA process improvements and automation opportunities.
  • Mentor junior QA engineers and promote a culture of ownership and accountability.
  • Prepare detailed test reports, metrics, and present QA status to stakeholders.

Preferred Skills

  • 8+ years of experience in Quality Assurance, with at least 2+ years in a lead or senior role.
  • Mandatory: ISTQB Certification (Foundation or Advanced Level).
  • Preferred: CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) or equivalent Ethical Hacking / Security Testing Certification.
  • Strong hands-on experience with manual and automation testing tools (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, JMeter, Postman, etc.).
  • Experience in API, Load, Performance, and Security Testing.
  • Excellent knowledge of SDLC, STLC, Defect Lifecycle, and Agile methodologies.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and test automation integration.
  • Exceptional analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong communication and client-handling abilities with a proactive mindset.

Note: Kindly mention in the email subject "Application for the post of Senior QA Lead"
summary: Seeking a Senior QA Lead to manage QA initiatives and ensure product quality. Requires strong leadership, testing expertise, and client management skills.
